name: Sweet and Sour Chickpeas
description: These sweet and sour chickpeas make such a delicious and easy weeknight dinner for the whole family! The recipe is so healthy and ready in just 15 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1  red bell pepper, cut into medium-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a blender. Blend until smooth
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a blender. Blend until smooth

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce into a large pan and cook on medium heat for a minute. Then add the red bell pepper and cook for 6-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the sauce into a large pan and cook on medium heat for a minute. Then add the red bell pepper and cook for 6-7 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the chickpeas and the pineapple. Stir well and cook for 3 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the chickpeas and the pineapple. Stir well and cook for 3 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped green onions and serve over rice. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped green onions and serve over rice. Enjoy!
